articles.title: Soap opera: Tam works up a lather, Mysore Sandal's Rs 6.2 crore deal angers Kannada groups
articles.author: Cynthia Chandran
articles.summary: Karnataka government has signed Tamannaah Bhatia as brand ambassador for Mysore Sandal Soap. Karnataka Soaps and Detergents Limited (KSDL) aims to expand the global reach of its products, hoping to enhance Mysore Sandal Soap's turnover to ₹5,000 crore.

articles.title: 27 Amazon Fashion Items Your Friend Group Will Covet
articles.author: Ana Maria Glavan
articles.summary: The article introduces a collection of new clothing and accessory items, including dresses, tops, pants, necklaces, bags, and more. These products are designed for various occasions and styles, offering a range of sizes and colors. Customer reviews and prices are provided, highlighting features and versatility.

articles.title: Video games on PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox X/S, PC, Switch: Check release dates
articles.author: Global Desk
articles.summary: Konami is releasing "Deliver At All Costs" on PlayStation 5, Xbox X/S, and PC. Happy Broccoli Games is launching "Duck Detective: The Ghost of Glamping" on PlayStation 5, Xbox X/S, Switch, and PC. From Software is releasing "Elden Ring: Nightreign" on PlayStation 5/4, Xbox X/S/One or PC on May 30.

articles.title: This Lululemon 2-in-1 Maxi Dress Is Dividing TikTok
articles.author: Nicole Stock
articles.summary: Lululemon introduced the new 2-in-1 Maxi Dress. This dress lacks frills, patterns, intricate detailing, and straps.

articles.title: Next's 'beautiful' day-to-night dress hailed as 'perfect' for any occasion
articles.author: Ruairi Scott Byrne
articles.summary: Next is offering the Mini Sleeveless Racer Stretch Linen Blend Dress, available in five designs and sizes 6-24, including tall and petite options, priced from €43.50 to €46. The dress features a linen-blend material, a button and zip-up closure, and a flattering high neck shape. Customer reviews highlight its versatility and comfort.

articles.title: Next's £32 dress channels 'Italian-inspired' Dolce & Gabbana vibes for a fraction of the price
articles.author: Shawna Healey
articles.summary: Next is selling the Cream Pink and Blue House Print Scoop Back Mini Shift Dress for £32. This new mini dress is considered a bargain due to its resemblance to a pricier designer version, Dolce & Gabbana.

articles.title: The battle to AI-enable the web: NLweb and what enterprises need to know
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: Microsoft has launched NLWeb, an open-source protocol, during the Build 2025 conference. NLWeb enables websites to easily add AI-powered conversational interfaces, effectively turning any website into an AI app where users can query content using natural language. It builds on existing web infrastructure while leveraging modern AI technologies.

articles.title: These Anker earbuds sound just as good as my AirPods Pro but for half the price
articles.author: Jack Wallen
articles.summary: Anker has launched its Soundcore Liberty 5 earbuds, now available on Amazon for $129. The earbuds are praised for their audio quality, robust low end, smooth mids, and clear highs. Users are encouraged to use the Soundcore app for customization and firmware updates.

articles.title: New Look's 'gorgeous' £36 summer dress that 'flatters the body'
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: New Look has launched the Gingham Check Tiered Midi Dress, priced at £35.99, available in pink or green and sizes 6 to 20. The dress is crafted from woven cotton and features a tiered silhouette and back waist ties. Nobody's Child offers a similar dress, the Black Gingham Sleeveless Tiered Charlie Midi Dress, priced at £89.

articles.title: Would you spend $99 on a bowl?
articles.author: The West Australian
articles.summary: The Face Dunk Bowl is a new product marketed for facial ice therapy, costing $99. The website uselessthingstobuy.com curates a variety of novel and arguably impractical items, such as the Sit N' Sip Refillable Winebag Chair, offering consumers unconventional and humorous purchasing options.

articles.title: 23 Products For Embarrassing Problems You Can't Ask About
articles.author: Gabriela Manjarrez
articles.summary: The article highlights the introduction of several personal care products, including Demora's foot exfoliation mask for removing dead skin, sulfate-free biotin shampoo for scalp cleansing, and a vegan ingrown hair oil for razor burn. It also features Veet's sensitive hair removal gel for gentle hair removal.

articles.title: Android 16's Desktop Mode Might Steal the Spark from Samsung DeX
articles.author: Arthur Brown
articles.summary: Google will soon allow users to test the desktop mode in Android 16 through a QPR1 Beta release for Pixel devices. This desktop mode aims to provide a desktop-like interface on larger displays and external displays, with windowed apps and UI adjustments. Google collaborated with Samsung to develop this feature.

articles.title: Velou decoding the future of ecommerce
articles.author: Jayana Kalansuriya
articles.summary: Velou introduces an AI-powered platform that refines raw product data into conversion-ready information, enhancing product visibility and conversion rates for online retailers. A key component is the 'Product Catalog Agent,' an intelligent virtual assistant that identifies errors, fills in missing details, and ensures product listings are up-to-date, all without manual effort.

articles.title: Anthropic's newest Claude AI models are experts at programming
articles.author: Kristian Kask
articles.summary: AI company Anthropic unveiled Claude 4, its new generation of AI models consisting of Claude 4 Opus and Claude 4 Sonnet. Both Claude 4 models are hybrid models capable of providing quick answers or deeper reasoning.

articles.title: Shoppers swap pressure washers for ‘game-changing' £25 patio cleaner
articles.author: Laura Mckenna Audience Writer
articles.summary: Amazon is featuring the Wet and Forget Outdoor Cleaning Solution, a highly-rated cleaner currently discounted to £25.89 for a 5-litre bottle, with customers praising its ease of use and effectiveness on outdoor surfaces. Alternatives like Spear and Jackson Spray and Leave (£15.99) and Sodium Hypochlorite Patio Cleaner are also highlighted, alongside the Electric Weed Sweeper from Wowcher (£34.99) and Yard Force's LW CPC1 Cordless Patio Cleaner (£135).

articles.title: Xiaomi's new Tesla-rivaling SUV has a cockpit-style panoramic windshield display and can charge in just 12 minutes
articles.author: Leon Poultney
articles.summary: Xiaomi has announced the YU7, an electric crossover following the SU7 sedan. The YU7 offers up to 519 miles of range and 680bhp in Max models, accelerating from 0-62mph in 3.2 seconds. It features fast charging capabilities, achieving a 10-80% charge in just 12 minutes.

articles.title: Gen Digital (NasdaqGS:GEN) Unveils AI-Driven Browser Norton Neo for Safer, Smarter Web Experience
articles.author: Simply Wall St
articles.summary: Gen Digital launched Norton Neo, a new AI-powered browser, to enhance user experience and security. This product launch, along with solid financial performance, contributed to investor confidence and a recent share price increase. The integration of AI-driven technologies is expected to drive revenue and earnings growth for the company.

articles.title: Shoppers race to Morrisons for ‘crazy cleaning clearance' with prices slashed from £6 to just 22p
articles.author: Yasmin Harisha
articles.summary: Morrisons is having a 'crazy cleaning clearance sale' with significant price reductions on cleaning products. Grace, The Sustainable Spender, highlighted Comfort Scent Booster Elixir First Blooms being sold at a reduced price. Additionally, smol's sustainable cleaning expert Catherine Green, shares laundry tips and promotes using smol's detergent.

articles.title: Shoppers race to Morrisons for ‘crazy cleaning clearance' with prices slashed from £6 to just 22p
articles.author: Yasmin Harisha
articles.summary: Morrisons is having a 'crazy cleaning clearance sale', slashing prices on cleaning products. The Comfort Scent Booster Elixir, originally priced at £6, is now available for 22p. Shoppers are rushing to Morrisons to take advantage of these deals.

articles.title: Shoppers race to Morrisons for ‘crazy cleaning clearance' with prices slashed from £6 to just 22p
articles.author: Yasmin Harisha
articles.summary: Morrisons is holding a "crazy cleaning clearance sale" with products slashed from £6 to as low as 22p. This includes the Comfort Scent Booster Elixir First Blooms, which provides 20 washes, now available at significantly reduced prices at certain locations.

articles.title: AngloGold Ashanti commissions GH₵1.8m soap factory in Obuasi
articles.summary: AngloGold Ashanti has commissioned the Dokyiwa Soap Factory in the Obuasi West Municipal under its Enterprise Development Programme with an investment of 1.8 million cedis. As part of the project, AngloGold also provided 35 women with six months' worth of raw materials to produce liquid and bar soaps.

articles.title: Experience smart photography with new Honor 400 Lite – now available in South Africa
articles.author: Honor South Africa
articles.summary: Honor has introduced the Honor 400 Lite smartphone, featuring an AI Camera Button for instant photo and video capture. The device boasts a 108MP main camera with portrait modes and a 6.7-inch AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate and is available in Velvet Black and Marrs Green.

articles.title: Noise Buds F1 TWS earbuds launched in India, costs just Rs 999 for limited period
articles.author: Pratyay
articles.summary: Noise has launched its new Noise Buds F1 TWS earbuds in India for an introductory price of Rs 999. The earbuds feature 11mm drivers, EQ modes, a quad-mic system with ENC, low-latency mode, Bluetooth 5.3, and IPX5 water resistance, offering a total playtime of up to 50 hours with fast charging. They are available in Calm Beige, Carbon Black, Mint Green, and True Purple colors on Flipkart.

articles.title: My favorite product releases this week: Dyson, Pokémon, Twelve South and more
articles.author: Rikka Altland
articles.summary: Twelve South has launched the PowerCord, a simplified iPhone/iPad charger combining a 30W wall adapter with USB-C cables. Dyson is introducing the PencilVac, a lightweight stick vacuum with a new 'Fluffycones' cleaning head. Nocs Provisions released the Zero Tube Monocular for $175, while Nanoleaf debuted the Smart Multicolor Rope Light for $60. MSI has launched the Claw A8 handheld gaming device with an AMD Ryzen Z2 Extreme chip. Finally, Marshall released its first soundbar, the Heston 120, featuring a retro design and Dolby Atmos sound.

articles.title: Peluncuran MINI John Cooper Works, Foto 4 #2019710
articles.summary: BMW Group Indonesia launched five new MINI John Cooper Works (JCW) models in Jakarta on May 23, 2025. The new models feature a combination of modern design, features, and maximum performance, available in both gasoline and electric versions.

articles.title: Symphony Innovate 2025: Cloud9 mobile unveiled, cybersecurity, quantum and AI take center stage
articles.author: Symphony
articles.summary: Symphony introduced the mobile version of its Cloud9 trader voice platform at the Innovate 2025 conference. The mobile app includes key features like an activity screen, call history, and multiple engagement modes. It also integrates Trader Voice Analytics to provide voice-driven data from conversations.

articles.title: Targetron Unveils Local Business Discovery Platform for Fast, Accurate Prospecting by Location
articles.summary: Targetron has launched its new Local Business Discovery Platform, a tool designed to help sales teams, marketers, and agencies find verified local business leads quickly. The platform allows users to generate lists of businesses filtered by location and category, with key contact information available for download.

articles.title: Air fryer that can cook four different foods at once 'best thing I've bought'
articles.author: Jake Holden
articles.summary: Ninja launched the Double Stack XL Air Fryer with four cooking levels and a 9.5L capacity. It's sold on Amazon and other retailers with features like Max Crisp, Air Fry, Roast, Bake, Reheat, and Dehydrate. Competitor brands like BiutiViita and Tower also offer dual stack air fryers.

articles.title: As Tamannaah Bhatia's Mysore Sandal 'Soap Opera' Bubbles Up, Minister Cites 'Global Goals'
articles.author: Harish Upadhya
articles.summary: Karnataka Soaps and Detergents Ltd (KSDL) is planning global expansion, including new international packaging, entry into the Gulf and European markets. KSDL plans to introduce new products like an international jasmine sandal soap and foray into the perfume market.

articles.title: YETI unveils new backpacks that can handle the rain and hold all of your gear
articles.author: Lehigh Valley
articles.summary: YETI has launched its new product, the Cayo Backpack, appealing to fans of their backpacks.

articles.title: Android owners warned over new apps on Google Play Store that could empty bank accounts of whopping £5,000
articles.author: Millie Turner
articles.summary: Google Play Store has increased its pricing limit for apps to £4,999. Currently, Fisherpunk, a spoof game, appears to be the most expensive app, costing £300. Google requires established developers to justify high prices, demonstrating significant revenue before approving the uplift.

articles.title: Benefits of Desi Ghee and Cow Ghee in Everyday Indian Dishes
articles.summary: Nova Dairy produces pure desi ghee and pure cow ghee using traditional methods. The ghee is simmered to retain its nutrients and flavor, offering health benefits and uses in cooking and traditional sweets.

articles.title: Shoppers 'love' Boden's 'flattering' summer T-shirt dress that's now £30 less
articles.author: Rachel Cronin
articles.summary: Boden is offering a sale on various items, including the Nina Smocked T-Shirt Dress, which is available with a discount code for a limited time. Next is also highlighted for their Wide Leg Trousers with linen. The trousers are available in different colors and prints.

articles.title: 'Miracle' £25 patio cleaner sees Brits ditching pressure washers ahead of the summer
articles.author: Laura Mckenna
articles.summary: The Wet and Forget Outdoor Cleaning Solution, along with alternatives like Spear and Jackson Spray and Leave and Sodium Hypochlorite Patio Cleaner, are available on Amazon as effective and affordable patio cleaning solutions. The Wet & Forget cleaner is being hailed as a 'game changer' due to its ease of use and effectiveness, with customers praising it as a better alternative to pressure washers. Yard Force's LW CPC1 Cordless Patio Cleaner is also available at Argos for a more intensified wash.

articles.title: LG USHERS IN SUMMER WITH MEMORIAL DAY PROMOTIONS ON TOP HOME AND ENTERTAINMENT PRODUCTS
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: LG Electronics USA is offering Memorial Day discounts on various products, including kitchen appliances like the Smart Counter-Depth MAX™ French Door Refrigerator and Smart Electric Double Oven Freestanding Range, laundry appliances like the LG WashTower™ and LG WashCombo™, vacuum cleaners such as the CordZero™ Kompressor, OLED TVs like the LG OLED evo G4 and C4, UltraGear monitors, gram laptops, and soundbars. The promotion runs through various dates in June 2025, providing consumers with significant savings on home and entertainment upgrades.

articles.title: Backblaze Publishes Q1 2025 Drive Stats Report Highlighting Hard Drive Reliability Trends
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Backblaze published an updated cloud storage report, highlighting its innovative alternatives to traditional cloud storage. Backblaze's offering includes various storage options and serves over 600,000 customers across 175 countries.

articles.title: Review: Taco Bell Mike's Hot Honey Diablo Sauce Makes Good Nuggets Better
articles.author: Dani Zoeller
articles.summary: Taco Bell launched Mike's Hot Honey Diablo Sauce on May 22nd, a limited-time offering intended for use with their new Crispy Chicken Nuggets. The sauce combines Mike's Hot Honey with Taco Bell's Diablo Sauce, featuring a smoky and sweet flavor profile designed to enhance the taste of the nuggets.

articles.title: Tesla's Optimus Robot Now Cooks And Cleans, Elon Musk Calls It 'Biggest Product Ever'
articles.author: Shubham Arora
articles.summary: Tesla's Optimus robot is now shown performing housework such as cooking, cleaning, and vacuuming. Elon Musk describes it as Tesla's 'biggest product ever', highlighting its learning capabilities through natural language instructions and internet videos. This demonstration sparks discussions about the robot's potential to assist in homes and improve the lives of disabled or elderly individuals.

articles.title: Top Face Washes Under ₹400 for Clear & Radiant Skin
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Foxtale offers a Gentle Hydrating Face Wash with hyaluronic acid and red algae on Flipkart. The Derma Co provides a Sali-Cinamide Face Wash with salicylic acid and niacinamide for acne treatment. Simple sells a Refreshing Facial Wash suitable for sensitive skin, while Cetaphil offers a Gentle Skin Cleanser for dry and irritated skin, all available on Flipkart.

articles.title: Enric Saavedra named Girbau North America Liaison
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Girbau North America (GNA), under EVI Industries Inc., is focused on developing new, high-quality laundry solutions with speed and precision to expand distribution and cater to specific niche markets.  This development aims to grow overall sales and fill gaps in current offerings.

articles.title: Surprise! These 13 Sunscreens Are Also Excellent Skin Care
articles.author: Lourdes Avila Uribe
articles.summary: Several companies have introduced or updated their sunscreen products with new formulations and benefits. Elemis launched Pro-Collagen Skin Protection Fluid SPF 50, Merit released The Uniform tinted mineral SPF 45, Shiseido updated its Ultimate Sun Protector Lotion SPF 60+, and Augustinus Bader introduced The Mineral Sunscreen SPF 50. These products focus on providing sun protection while incorporating skincare benefits like hydration, anti-aging, and skin tone improvement.

articles.title: Save cards on Android: Is google's NFC safe?
articles.author: Farah Mokrani
articles.summary: Google is introducing a new NFC feature in Android 16 that allows users to quickly save their bank cards to their phones by tapping the card against the phone.  The feature requires the CVC code for verification, adding a layer of security before the card is fully saved to the device. While convenient, users are advised to remain vigilant about card security and prevent unauthorized access to their cards.

articles.title: Top 5 Latest Innovations for Bespoke Product Boxes
articles.author: Business Strategist
articles.summary: The article highlights innovations in custom product packaging, including digital printing techniques, sustainable materials, sensory finishes, 3D prints, and interactive features. Companies are adopting these advancements to enhance brand appeal, ensure product integrity, and meet consumer demand for eco-friendly and engaging packaging.

articles.title: Freedom Wash Laundry Provides Enhanced Pickup and Delivery Services with the Addition of a Branded Van
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: Freedom Wash Laundry is providing more efficient laundry pickup and delivery services. This aims to improve customer experience through convenience.

articles.title: Custom Digital Solutions Launches 'SearchGPT' – New AI-Powered SEO Division to Help Businesses Sail the AI Revolution
articles.summary: Custom Digital Solutions (CDS) has launched SearchGPT, a new AI-powered SEO service line. SearchGPT integrates AI models into technical SEO, content generation, and competitive analysis to deliver scalable results for clients seeking organic growth. The service offers real-time content scoring, AI-driven keyword clustering, and customized automation workflows.

articles.title: Discount for sale at Shopaz: Buy Dell Inspiron Ryzen7 32GB/1TB SSD laptop and save 180 euros
articles.author: Shop Az
articles.summary: Shopaz has launched a discount campaign for new customers, offering a 25% discount or 25 EUR with the code WELCOME25 upon registration. Furthermore, Shopaz is offering a discount of up to 180 € on the Dell Inspiron Ryzen 7 laptop.

articles.title: Meizu accelerates global expansion with AI-powered ecosystem and products
articles.author: 董欣怡
articles.summary: Meizu, a smartphone brand of DreamSmart Group, is expanding globally and has unveiled a string of smartphones and StarV View augmented reality glasses at a recent product launch event. The company is implementing its "All in AI" strategy in early 2024 and building the Flyme AIOS platform, integrating AI smartphones, smart glasses and wearables, intelligent vehicle systems, and user-centric cloud services.

articles.title: Vodafone TV Czech launches own film channels
articles.author: Julian Clover
articles.summary: Vodafone launched Vodafone Family, Vodafone Comedy, and Vodafone CZ/SK, a suite of new, commercial-free movie channels for subscribers in the Czech and Slovak republics. These channels are available within the Vodafone TV and Vodafone TV+ program offerings and offer features like restart, rewind, and fast forward. The platform was created in partnership with Starmax Media, utilizing Tivia's technology, with content provided by Bontonfilm.

articles.title: Why Tamannaah Bhatia not Kannada actresses Rashmika or Anushka Shetty for Mysore Sandal Soap? Karnataka minister justifies strategy amid backlash
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: The Karnataka government appointed Tamannaah Bhatia as the brand ambassador for Mysore Sandal Soap, a product of Karnataka Soaps and Detergents Limited (KSDL). This decision aims to expand the brand's reach beyond Karnataka, targeting an annual revenue of Rs 5,000 crore by 2028.

articles.title: 48 Products With Dramatic Before And Afters
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Catrice launched "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener, a tinted concealer with hyaluronic acid and shea butter. Sol de Janerio introduced Brazilian Bum Bum body cream, a lotion featuring guarana extract, coconut oil, and caffeine. Essence released Lash Princess Mascara, a mascara that adds volume and length to lashes.

articles.title: Available Now - Perfect Corp. Debuts New GenAI Clothes Virtual Try-On for Brand and Retailer Websites, Apps and API
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Perfect Corp. has launched AI Clothes Try-on, a new generative AI-powered experience for virtual fashion shopping. This technology allows consumers to virtually try on outfits using a single photo, and is available via the YouCam Makeup app, the YouCam Online Editor, and an API for developers.

articles.title: Available Now - Perfect Corp. Debuts New GenAI Clothes Virtual Try-On for Brand and Retailer Websites, Apps and API
articles.summary: Perfect Corp. has launched AI Clothes Try-on, a new Generative AI-powered experience for virtual fashion shopping. The feature allows consumers to virtually try on outfits with different fabrics and colors using just one photo. It is available through the YouCam Makeup app and YouCam Online Editor, and via the YouCam Online Editor AI Clothes Try-on API for brands and developers.

articles.title: Available Now - Perfect Corp. Debuts New GenAI Clothes Virtual Try-On for Brand and Retailer Websites, Apps and API
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Perfect Corp. launched AI Clothes Try-on, a new Generative AI-powered experience for virtual fashion shopping. This product enables consumers to virtually try on entire outfits in various fabrics and colors using just one photo.

articles.title: Netflix's AI Ads and Viewers Aren't Happy
articles.author: Tarek Salame
articles.summary: Netflix is introducing AI-generated ads that will be inserted into shows, matching the tone and setting of the content. These ads are part of Netflix's strategy to grow its ad-supported tier, which has over 94 million users. The new ad service is being introduced next year.

articles.title: OnePlus 13s launch on June 5: Check processor, camera, price, and more we know so far
articles.author: Aishwarya Panda
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching the OnePlus 13s smartphone in India on June 5, 2025. It features a compact design, a dual camera setup with 50MP main and telephoto lenses, and a 6.32-inch 8T LTPO AMOLED display. The phone is powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite processor and is expected to have a 6000mAh battery with 80W fast charging, with an expected price of around Rs.45000.

articles.title: ESScent Of The Week: This $85 Fragrance From NOYZ Smells Like Golden Hour On Your Skin
articles.author: Kimberly Wilson
articles.summary: NOYZ launched their Detour EDP, a floral gourmand fragrance priced at $85. The fragrance features notes of Spanish mandarin, pink pepper, apple blossom, and white florals, designed to capture a fresh and spontaneous scent for warmer months. Detour is available in 50mL and travel sizes.

articles.title: Gen Digital's Norton intros safety-first AI-native web browser
articles.summary: Gen Digital's Norton is launching Norton Neo, an AI-native safe web browsing experience. The web browser, currently in early access in the US, features a built-in personal assistant powered by conversational AI. Norton plans a general release after integrating customer feedback.

articles.title: SK hynix unveils world's highest 321-layer NAND chip for smartphones
articles.author: 엑셀마왕의 실무엑셀 프리미엄 콘텐츠
articles.summary: SK hynix has developed and announced the launch of UFS 4.1, a new mobile storage solution based on 321-layer 1Tb TLC 4D NAND flash, designed for on-device AI in mobile phones. The new solution improves power efficiency by 7% and reduces thickness to 0.85 millimeters compared to SK Hynix's previous 238-layer NAND-based product.

articles.title: ThunderSoft Showcases Japan-Focused Smart Vehicle Solutions at Automotive Engineering Exposition 2025 Yokohama  May. 23, 2025 10:50
articles.summary: ThunderSoft debuted its next-generation smart vehicle solutions at the Automotive Engineering Exposition 2025 Yokohama, including the AquaDrive OS 1.0 Evo, an AI-native smart cockpit operating system. Additionally, ThunderSoft partnered with Renesas Electronics to jointly develop a lightweight ZCU virtualization platform for in-vehicle electronic architectures.

articles.title: Best sulfate-free shampoo
articles.author: Best Reviews
articles.summary: The article recommends OGX Nourishing + Coconut Milk Moisturizing Shampoo as a moisturizing and nourishing sulfate-free option, L'Oreal Paris EverPure Sulfate-Free Moisture Shampoo and Conditioner as an affordable choice with a fresh rosemary scent, and Cantu Sulfate-Free Cleansing Cream Shampoo for coarse, curly, and dry hair due to its shea butter content.

articles.title: Weekly Recap: 15 Consumer Press Releases You Need to See
articles.summary: Dave & Buster's is introducing a summer season pass. In addition, the article references the availability of new dairy-free summer treats. These announcements are part of a weekly recap of consumer press releases distributed by PR Newswire.

articles.title: Weekly Recap: 15 Consumer Press Releases You Need to See
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: A new auction and exhibition of iconic rock and roll gear was announced. Additionally, new dairy-free summer treats have been introduced. Dave and Buster's is offering a new summer season pass.

articles.title: Manhattan Associates Unveils Agentic AI Innovation at Momentum 2025  May. 23, 2025 10:21
articles.summary: Manhattan Associates is launching Agentic AI support within Manhattan Active solutions, introducing AI agents like the Intelligent Store Manager and Labor Optimiser Agent. They also launched Manhattan Agent Foundry, a platform enabling customers to build and deploy their own AI agents within the Manhattan ecosystem, available Spring 2025.

articles.title: From Hyderabad to Abu Dhabi: How Hub71 Is fuelling a new era of cross-border innovation
articles.author: Shariq Khan
articles.summary: Hub71 fosters innovation and entrepreneurship. Hub71's programs are helping companies like Cars24, Ultrahuman, Arcab, Hafla and Funder AI launch and scale healthtech and mobility solutions internationally by providing access to capital, regulations and global network.

articles.title: 삼성, 갤럭시 S25 엣지로 아이폰 17 에어 출시 앞두고 슬림폰 시장 탐색
articles.author: LEE JAE-LIM
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy S25 Edge, a slim smartphone with a 5.8mm thickness, targeting consumers interested in aesthetics. The S25 Edge features a Snapdragon 8 Gen 4 Elite processor, a redesigned vapor chamber for thermal control, and a Corning Gorilla Glass 2 display with a titanium frame, while having a 3,900mAh battery.

articles.title: 36 TikTok Products That Are Worth Every Penny
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: E.l.f launched Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara, designed for thin lashes with smudge-proof extension and easy removal. Clinique is promoting Almost Lipstick Tinted Lip Balm in Black Honey,  a cult-classic, lightweight, slightly glossy shade. Olay released Super Serum Body Wash, packed with niacinamide, shea butter, and collagen peptides for 24-hour hydration.

articles.title: How Context, Commerce And Creative Deliver New Opportunities For Advertisers
articles.author: Eric Hoffert
articles.summary: LG is focused on developing CTV as a 'full-funnel commerce experience'. New CTV advertising formats are emerging, utilizing AI and scene-level data to integrate creative content directly into the viewing experience. Brands can use these platforms to create high-definition CTV ads, which helps to democratize access to smaller businesses.

articles.title: I'm the Queen of Clean & Aldi has SO many products I love – the fabric conditioner smells great & prices start from 89p
articles.author: Claudia Jackson
articles.summary: Aldi is offering a range of cleaning products, including Almat Premium Fabric Conditioner in cherry blossom and sea salt & driftwood scents, Mr Muscle Stainless Steel & Hob spray, and Astonish cleaning products like Toilet Fresh in eucalyptus and Multi-Purpose Cleaner Bleach. These products are available at budget-friendly prices, as highlighted by cleaning expert Lynsey.

articles.title: I'm the Queen of Clean & Aldi has SO many products I love – the fabric conditioner smells great & prices start from 89p
articles.author: Claudia Jackson
articles.summary: Aldi stocks a variety of cleaning products, including Almat Premium Fabric Conditioner in cherry blossom and sea salt & driftwood scents. Cleaning expert Lynsey Crombie recommends products like Astonish Toilet Fresh, Scrub Daddy Damp Dusters, Mr Muscle Stainless Steel & Hob spray, and Astonish Fizz & Fresh toilet bowl tablets, all available at Aldi.

articles.title: Xiaomi unveils YU7 SUV with AI features, HyperEngine, and bold design
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Xiaomi launched its first SUV, the Xiaomi YU7. The YU7 is a high-performance luxury electric vehicle that blends premium design with breakthrough technology and marks a milestone in Xiaomi's expansion into the EV market.

articles.title: I reviewed the Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge and it's a slim sensation with one fatal flaw
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy S25 Edge, a thin and light smartphone featuring a 6.7in AMOLED screen, Snapdragon 8 Elite CPU, and a 200MP main camera. Pre-orders are available from Samsung US or Samsung UK ahead of the May 30 launch. While it boasts flagship-grade performance, the phone's battery life is a significant drawback.

articles.title: "Biggest Product Ever": Elon Musk Shares Video Of Tesla's Optimus Robot Cooking, Cleaning
articles.author: Bhavya Sukheja
articles.summary: Tesla, led by Elon Musk, is developing the Optimus robot. The robot demonstrates skills like cooking, cleaning, and vacuuming, learning tasks through natural language instructions and videos. The Optimus robot is being positioned as Tesla's "biggest product ever."

articles.title: அதிக பவர், கூடுதல் வசதிகள்.. மேம்பட்ட பஜாஜ் பல்சர் NS 400Z பைக் விரைவில் வெளியாகிறது.. என்ன விலையில்?
articles.summary: Bajaj is expected to update the Pulsar NZ 400Z street naked motorcycle. The update may include new features and increased power.

articles.title: Best designer fragrances to save up to 50% on in Lookfantastic's huge sale
articles.author: Emma North
articles.summary: Lookfantastic is having a fragrance sale with up to 50% off on perfumes from brands like Lancôme, YSL, and Marc Jacobs. Highlighted products include Lancôme's La Vie est Belle Eau de Parfum, YSL's Libre Eau de Parfum, and Marc Jacobs Daisy Ever So Fresh, each with a description of its scent profile and the discount offered.

articles.title: Realme Neo 7 Turbo launch date is announced: Expected to come with Media Dimensity 9400e chip, 7,000mAh battery, and more
articles.author: Anusha Jain
articles.summary: Realme is launching the Neo 7 Turbo smartphone in China on May 29. The phone features MediaTek's Dimensity 9400e CPU, a dual rear camera system with a 50-megapixel primary sensor, and Realme's Dart charging technology. It will be available in Transparent Black and Transparent Grey, with a 1.5K display and a 7,000mAh battery with 100W rapid charging.

articles.title: Opening date confirmed for new Surrey retail park Superdrug
articles.author: Victoria Shipp
articles.summary: Superdrug is opening a new store in Guildford's Ladymead Retail Park on Thursday, May 29th. The store, located between Costa Coffee and M&S, will be the only one of its kind in the retail park, offering a range of toiletries, make up and health products.

articles.title: 5Y View｜如何打造真正有用的AI产品？生成式AI改变的创业规则
articles.author: 作者：Chris Pedregal
articles.summary: Granola, an AI-powered meeting note-taking application, focuses on enhancing meeting notes using transcription and AI. The company prioritizes offering a "Ferrari-level" user experience by utilizing the most advanced AI models and optimizing non-AI features to improve overall user satisfaction. The company's product strategy emphasizes focusing on a narrow and specific use case to deliver an exceptional experience.

articles.title: Tamannaah Bhatia as face of Mysore Sandal: Kannada activists stage protest
articles.author: The Hindu Bureau
articles.summary: Karnataka Soaps & Detergents Limited (KSDL) appointed actress Tamannaah Bhatia as the brand ambassador for its products, including Mysore Sandal soap. The aim is to boost the brand's appeal and achieve a ₹5,000 crore turnover target by 2028, penetrating markets beyond Karnataka.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge review: In pursuit of slimness
articles.author: Tushar Kanwar
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy S25 Edge, a slim and lightweight flagship phone featuring a 6.7-inch display, Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, and a 200MP primary camera. The phone has 12GB RAM with 256GB or 512GB memory options and is priced at ₹ 1,09,999.

articles.title: Mango juice is more than a drink, it's a taste of tradition and health
articles.author: Statesman News Service
articles.summary: Patanjali Mango Drink is a ready-to-serve fruit drink made from pure mango pulp, combining traditional Indian flavors with a brand associated with natural wellness. It is available in compact, ready-to-serve bottles and is accessible through Patanjali outlets and local stores.

articles.title: Samsung giving away FREE £800 Galaxy S25 phones if you buy any TV from list of 43 models – and we reveal the cheapest
articles.summary: Samsung is offering a free Samsung Galaxy S25 smartphone with the purchase of select Neo QLED TVs; customers can use the code AITV at checkout on the official Samsung website to claim the phone. Additionally, the code SPRING shaves 20% off the price of the TV and can be combined with the AITV code to reduce the price of the TV and claim a free Galaxy S25 mobile, while supplies last and until June 10.

articles.title: Samsung giving away FREE £800 Galaxy S25 phones if you buy any TV from list of 43 models – and we reveal the cheapest
articles.author: Sean Keach
articles.summary: Samsung is offering a free Samsung Galaxy S25 smartphone with the purchase of select Neo QLED TVs. Customers can use the code AITV at checkout on the official Samsung website to claim the phone, and the code SPRING for 20% off the price of the TV; both codes expire on June 10. The offer applies to models in Samsung's Neo QLED TVs line-up.

articles.title: Samsung giving away FREE £800 Galaxy S25 phones if you buy any TV from list of 43 models – and we reveal the cheapest
articles.author: Sean Keach
articles.summary: Samsung is offering a promotion where customers can get a free Samsung Galaxy S25 smartphone when they purchase select Neo QLED TVs. Customers can use the code AITV at checkout on Samsung's website to claim the phone. The deal applies to models in Samsung's Neo QLED TVs line-up, and an additional 20% discount can be applied using the code SPRING.

articles.title: This New BYD EV Costs Half as Much as a Tesla—Starts Under $14,000
articles.author: Eric Collins
articles.summary: BYD has launched its new mid-size electric sedan, the e7, starting at 103,800 CNY (approximately 14,408 USD) with a promotional price of 99,800 CNY. The e7 offers two LFP Blade battery options with ranges of 450 km and 520 km. BYD plans to integrate the e7 into its Ocean series, aiming to compete in the affordable EV market.

articles.title: Claude 4 核心提示词曝光｜最懂提示词的大模型公司，现在怎么写 Prompt？
articles.author: 一泽Eze
articles.summary: Anthropic has released Claude 4, including the Claude 4 Opus and Sonnet models, with updated system prompts and design dimensions. Claude 4 incorporates specific world information, such as the 2024 US presidential election results. The update reflects a shift from rule-driven to principle-guided prompting, emphasizing multi-step reasoning and focusing on core capabilities while reducing redundant persona elements.

articles.title: Even as an Apple fan, right now I wouldn't use an iPhone if you gave me it for free
articles.summary: The 8849 Tank 3 Pro Android phone is reviewed, emphasizing its ruggedness, extended battery life (23,800 mAh), and integrated laser projector. The review contrasts this phone with iPhones, highlighting Android's strengths in customization and notification management, suggesting innovation beyond incremental Apple upgrades.

articles.title: Boden shoppers say 'I feel like a million dollars' in £88 dress reduced to £44
articles.author: Shawna Healey
articles.summary: Boden has released a discount code offering 25% off its entire website, including already reduced items like the Ivy Smocked Midi Dress. Shoppers can purchase the Ivy Dress for £44.10 using the discount code 7N7G, resulting in a 54% saving. The dress, available in petite, regular, and long lengths, is praised for its flattering fit and comfortable design.

articles.title: HONOR 400 series debuts as brand captures quarter of all sold-out phones
articles.summary: HONOR has launched its HONOR 400 series smartphones, including the HONOR 400 and HONOR 400 Pro, featuring AI capabilities and advanced camera technology. The HONOR 400 Pro, priced at RM2,699, offers 24GB RAM and 512GB ROM, while the HONOR 400 comes in two configurations with either 256GB or 512GB ROM. Pre-orders are available until May 29, with various free gifts and upgrades.

articles.title: Notepad++: From Barely Maintained to AI Writer – Archyde: Latest World News, Economy, Entertainment, Health, Technology & Sports Updates
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Microsoft is introducing generative AI features to its Notepad, Paint, and Snipping Tool applications. Notepad now allows users to write AI-generated text from scratch. Paint receives a sticker generator and an AI-powered smart select tool. Users require a Microsoft account and AI credits to use these features, with Microsoft 365 subscribers receiving more credits.

articles.title: Fintech experts converge as new AI firm unveils operations in Nigeria
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Dyna.Ai, an AI-as-a-Service provider, launched its operations in Nigeria. At the Nigeria Dyna Day event in Lagos, the company introduced its suite of AI-powered products and solutions to the Nigerian financial ecosystem.

articles.title: Samsung and LG Clash Again—This Time Over Market Share in All-in-One Washer-Dryer Segment
articles.author: Korea Bizwire
articles.summary: Samsung launched its Bespoke AI Combo washer-dryer in February 2024, which has since sold over 100,000 units domestically. LG, meanwhile, announced that its combined sales of hybrid washer-dryer appliances—including the flagship Tromm WashTower and newer WashCombo—have surpassed 1.1 million units in Korea, with 1 million of those attributed to the WashTower model alone.

articles.title: These smart gadgets can enhance your at-home experience
articles.author: Deanna Taylor
articles.summary: Kasa introduces a smart Wi-Fi plug, priced at $41.99 for a four-pack. Ring offers a battery doorbell cam for $59.99. Google features the Nest Learning Thermostat for $239.99. ROKU launches Plus Series Smart TVs starting at $398. Philips offers A19 LED Smart Color-Changing Light Bulb for $12.97. LG releases 16H Prime Home Backup Battery for $3,999.

articles.title: Amazon reduces telescopic brush that's a 'revelation' for cleaning upstairs windows
articles.author: Zoe Chamberlain
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a discounted '17ft IGADPole Washing Kit', a telescopic brush cleaner, reduced from £109.97 to £104.97. The kit includes a water-fed brush, cobweb duster, squeegee, and soap dispenser, and features a telescoping pole extending to five meters. Customer reviews highlight its lightweight design and effectiveness.

articles.title: MoCI launches two AI-powered services
articles.summary: The Ministry of Commerce and Industry (MoCI), in collaboration with Microsoft, launched two AI-powered virtual assistants: Smart Assistant, available through the Single Window platform, and Saif, on the Ministry's website. Smart Assistant aims to facilitate procedures and expedite transactions by providing immediate responses and guidance.

articles.title: Google to let users test Android 16 desktop mode on phones with external display support, here's how
articles.summary: Google announced the upcoming desktop mode feature in Android 16, revealed at Google I/O 2025. This feature brings desktop-like functionality to Android phones when connected to external displays and builds upon earlier tablet efforts. Google collaborated with Samsung, leveraging Samsung's DeX platform, to enhance multitasking and independent display operation in Android 16.

articles.title: ThunderSoft Showcases Japan-Focused Smart Vehicle Solutions at Automotive Engineering Exposition 2025 Yokohama
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: ThunderSoft introduced AquaDrive OS 1.0 Evo, an AI-native smart cockpit operating system developed on the Qualcomm 8775 platform. The company also partnered with Renesas Electronics to develop a lightweight ZCU virtualization platform. Furthermore, they highlighted KanziOne, a unified HMI development platform.

articles.title: ThunderSoft Showcases Japan-Focused Smart Vehicle Solutions at Automotive Engineering Exposition 2025 Yokohama
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: ThunderSoft showcased its Japan-focused smart vehicle solutions at the Automotive Engineering Exposition 2025 Yokohama, introducing AquaDrive OS 1.0 Evo, an AI-native smart cockpit operating system; a lightweight ZCU Virtualization Platform co-developed with Renesas Electronics; and KanziOne, a unified HMI development platform. These solutions aim to accelerate carbon neutrality, advance connected car technologies, and drive the adoption of Software-Defined Vehicles in Japan.

articles.title: A Revolution in AI Led by Emirati Entrepreneur: Zainlee Technologies to Launch 'Qallix'
articles.author: E247
articles.summary: Zainlee Technologies is launching Qallix, a new AI website builder designed to help businesses establish their digital presence. Qallix aims to capture over 20% of the regional market and attract over 30,000 users within six months by offering a platform to build professional websites in five minutes using AI and open-source technologies.

articles.title: Eyeing the Dyson Supersonic Nural Hair Dryer? It's Now at Its Lowest Price Ever
articles.author: Macy Meyer
articles.summary: Dyson's Supersonic Nural hair dryer is currently on sale on Amazon for $399, a 20% discount from its regular $500 price. This limited-time offer marks the product's lowest price yet.

articles.title: The world's fastest SSD is now on sale, just in time for Memorial Day, and it even comes with a free VPN
articles.author: Wayne Williams
articles.summary: Western Digital's WD BLACK SN8100 PCIe Gen 5 SSD is now available for purchase outside of Sandisk. The SSD, sold at retailer Newegg with a free VPN, delivers high sequential read speeds up to 14,900MB/s and write speeds up to 14,000MB/s, with random read performance over 2.3 million IOPS.

articles.title: Manhattan Associates Unveils Agentic AI Innovation at Momentum 2025
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Manhattan Associates has launched Agentic AI support within Manhattan Active® solutions, including AI agents, along with Manhattan Agent Foundry™, a platform to build custom agents. These offerings aim to revolutionize supply chain commerce execution, optimisation, and user experiences, with the AI agents becoming generally available in Spring 2025.

articles.title: 대전시, 지역 캐릭터 활용한 ‘꿈돌이 라면' 출시
org: Shinsegae Department Store Daejeon Promotion Center
articles.summary: Daejeon City is launching 'Daejeon Kkumdoli Ramen' on June 9, featuring beef and seafood jjambbong flavors. It will be available at locations like Daejeon Station, Kkumdoli House, Shinsegae Department Store, GS25, and online via the Daejeon Hometown Love Donation Mall.

articles.title: Google Search: Its evolution is being led by GenAI and Gen Z
articles.author: Mint Editorial Board
articles.summary: Google updated its search service to include 'AI Overviews', which use GenAI to offer a summary on top of search results and has touched over 1.5 billion users. Google also introduced 'AI Mode', which utilizes Gemini to handle complex queries and sustain chats. These updates allow Google's interface to handle tasks like itinerary planning and document drafting.

articles.title: vivo V50 Lite with IP65 rating: Built for tropical life
articles.author: Inquirer.Net Brandroom
articles.summary: vivo has launched the vivo V50 Lite smartphone in the Philippines. The phone features IP65 dust and water resistance and is designed for challenging environments. It is now available for Php 13,999.

articles.title: Samsung Electronics Targets Global Market with AI Washer-Dryer
articles.author: Editor
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics is expanding its Bespoke AI Combo washer-dryer lineup globally, launching new models like the 2025 Bespoke AI Combo with increased capacity and enhanced AI features. The company is also introducing a vent-type washer-dryer in North America and plans to release the premium Infinite AI Combo domestically by the end of the year, aiming to double sales. This involves product launches in new markets, including India, Turkey and South Africa.

articles.title: Samsung launches ultra-slim Galaxy S25 Edge smartphone in S. Korea
articles.author: Chang Dong-woo
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics launched the Galaxy S25 Edge, a thin and lightweight smartphone, in South Korea. The S25 Edge features high-end camera capabilities, Galaxy AI-powered editing tools, and the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset. It is available in three colors and two storage variants, starting at 1,496,000 won.

articles.title: SKAN expands digital service portfolio with acquisition of Metronik
articles.author: Pharmiweb
articles.summary: SKAN is expanding its digital service portfolio. This expansion is achieved through the integration of Metronik, which aims to increase customer efficiency along the entire value chain by seamlessly integrating into their production processes.

articles.title: AgiBot launches new humanoid robot
articles.author: Shenzhen Daily
articles.summary: AgiBot has released the Lingxi X2 android and is recruiting business partners to commercialize it. The Lingxi X2 is available for purchase starting Thursday, and AgiBot aims to transform androids into scene application tools through human interaction data.

articles.title: Sophos accelerates business growth for MSPs with new program
articles.author: Manila Standard
articles.summary: Sophos launched Sophos MSP Elevate. Sophos MSP Elevate is a new product.

articles.title: No Steam Deck Needed—SteamOS Now Installable On ROG Ally And Legion Go
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Steam Deck is receiving new features. AMD handhelds, including ROG Ally and Legion Go, now have an official SteamOS installer available.

articles.title: Where to Find the Best Soft Serve in Egypt
articles.summary: Canelé Pâtisserie offers smooth, rich soft serve that can be paired with tarts. Maine serves tall, cold soft serve, while Conitta offers creamy, old-school soft serve. Swirkies provides soft serve with colourful cones and toppings. The BRGR Truck serves classic soft serve which is suitable after fries. Anst offers soft serve that tastes good and looks appealing, while Amaretti offers rich soft serve. Hans & Gretel provides soft serve with big, bright toppings, and Udu Chocolatier serves intense, chocolatey soft serve.

articles.title: How Connected Identity And Data Are Creating A New Era Of Customer Experience
articles.author: Richard Sine
articles.summary: Acxiom's Real Identity solutions and clean rooms help brands personalize customer experiences and orchestrate customer data across various channels. For example, Acxiom helped a premium electronics brand recognize 82% of website visitors, resulting in a 29% increase in order frequency and a 47% increase in revenue per visitor. Acxiom also assisted an automaker in orchestrating customer data, leading to $50 million in additional conversions and $20 million in reduced churn.

articles.title: Row over Tamannaah Bhatia's appointment as KSDL brand ambassador
articles.summary: Karnataka Soaps and Detergents Limited (KSDL) is positioning its products, including Mysore Sandal Soap, as a global brand with new packaging for international markets. The company has engaged Tamannaah Bhatia as a brand ambassador and is establishing a new factory in Vijayapura, along with rolling out 23 new projects.

articles.title: Hudhud Shop: A gateway to E-commerce in Syria
articles.author: Enab Baladi
articles.summary: The Syrian Minister of Communications and Technology, Abdulsalam Haykal, launched the Hudhud platform. This digital platform aims to export Syrian products to foreign markets, directly connecting local producers with foreign markets.

articles.title: Nutella launches new spread that's 'better than the original' - and it's available on Amazon ...
articles.author: The Daily Mail
articles.summary: Nutella is launching a new variety of its hazelnut spread in supermarkets across the UK. This new variety is described as 'better than the original'.

articles.title: Shopify just dropped 150+ updates, including a new AI store theme builder
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Shopify introduces the Summer '25 Edition. The edition includes more than 150 new features.

articles.title: Eyeing the Dyson Supersonic Nural Hair Dryer? It's Now at Its Lowest Price Ever
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Dyson is offering its hair dryer for over $100 off for a limited time.

articles.title: PlaySafe ID Secures $1.1 Million To Tackle Cheating, Safety In Gaming
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: A company is planning to launch its technology in late 2025. They anticipate acquiring 250,000 users within the first few months after the launch.

articles.title: Huawei launches new line of products in Mexico City
articles.author: Xinhua
articles.summary: Huawei launched its new line of products under the "Fashion Next" concept in Mexico City on May 21, 2025. The launch included the Huawei Watch 5, Huawei Watch Fit 4, Huawei Watch Fit 4 Pro, and Huawei FreeBuds 6.

articles.title: BMW Will Turn Its Concept Speedtop Into 50 Road Cars
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Concept Speedtop, a hard-topped follow up to the Concept Skytop, will have a 70-unit production run. Each unit will be priced at close to half a million dollars.

articles.title: Transforming the Naming Process: Best Name Generator Discovers Innovative AI-Powered Tool
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Best Name Generator launched a new AI-driven platform. The platform simplifies name generation for startups and other entities.
